snippet.title: NHL 18 | Official Teaser Trailer | Xbox One, PS4
snippet.description:
SUBSCRIBE: http://x.ea.com/32017
SIGN UP FOR NHL®18 NEWS: http://x.ea.com/31863

Get your first look at the EA SPORTS™ NHL®18 now in the new teaser trailer.  

Set your calendar and tune into the NHL Awards in Las Vegas on June 21st as EA SPORTS™ reveals the NHL®18 cover athlete, first official gameplay trailer, features, release date and more!

Coming Fall 2017 to PS4 and Xbox One.
